org.sedml
Class ModelTransformationUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.sedml.ModelTransformationUtils

public class ModelTransformationUtils
extends Object

A collection of utility methods for applying XPath transformations to XML based models.

Author:
radams

Method Detail

deleteXMLElement

public static String deleteXMLElement(String originalModel,
                                      String xPathToElementToDelete,
                                      NamespaceContext context)
                               throws XMLException,
                                      XPathEvaluationException
Will delete all elements matching the supplied XPath expression

Parameters:
originalModel - A String of the XML of the model to be altered
xPathToElementToDelete - A valid XPath String defining the elements to be removed
context - A NamespaceContext
Returns:
A String of the modified model.
Throws:
XMLException - if errors occur reading or writing XML
XPathEvaluationException - if errors occur applying the XPath expression.

addXMLelement

public static String addXMLelement(String model,
                                   String xmlToAdd,
                                   String xPathTpoParentElement,
                                   NamespaceContext context)
                            throws XMLException,
                                   XPathEvaluationException
Inserts a block of XML in the model.

Parameters:
model - A String of the XML Representation of the model
xmlToAdd - The XML to insert
xPathToParentElement - An XPath expression to the parent elements to insert the XML
context - A NamespaceContext
Returns:
A String of the model XML with the added XML element
Throws:
XMLException - if errors occur reading or writing XML
XPathEvaluationException - if errors occur applying the XPath expression.
